name: Houlihan Lokey, Inc.
description: Houlihan Lokey, Inc. is a leading global investment bank that provides a comprehensive range of financial advisory services, including mergers and acquisitions (M&A), capital markets, financial restructuring, and valuation services. Founded in 1972, Houlihan Lokey operates with a unique business model that focuses on delivering client-centric solutions and maintaining a strong commitment to integrity, collaboration, and excellence. The firm has established itself as a trusted advisor to corporations, financial sponsors, and government entities around the world, offering deep industry expertise across various sectors including healthcare, technology, consumer products, and real estate. With an extensive network of offices across the United States, Europe, and Asia, Houlihan Lokey is recognized for its strong performance in M&A advisory and has consistently ranked among the top firms in terms of deal volume. The company is committed to providing innovative solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of its clients, leveraging its global reach and local expertise to navigate complex financial landscapes. Houlihan Lokey's mission is to help clients achieve their financial goals while fostering long-term relationships built on trust and performance.
